[[File:Library.png|thumb|The Library Beta.]]The '''Library''' is a feature to simplify the process of finding and importing educational content directly in the game. It is available exclusively for teachers and students that uses {{el|ee}}. It contains a list of the most popular worlds to import and use.

== Trivia ==
* Before the release of the Library Beta, teachers and students were forced to use the full world library on [https://education.minecraft.net education.minecraft.net] to download worlds.
* Unlike the [[Marketplace]], all content of the library is free to use.
